meanings.sent1: The oncogeneses in the body can lead to the growth of cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study oncogeneses to understand how cancer develops.
meanings.sent3: The oncogeneses at play in the body are like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: The oncogeneses spreading through the body are like seeds of disease taking root.
meanings.sent5: Understanding oncogeneses is crucial for early cancer detection.

meanings.sent1: Early detection can prevent the oncogeneses from progressing into cancer.
meanings.sent2: The oncogeneses resulted in the formation of a malignant tumor.
meanings.sent3: The oncogeneses seemed to be playing a cruel trick on the body.
meanings.sent4: The oncogeneses crept silently, like a thief in the night.
meanings.sent5: The oncogeneses spread like wildfire, consuming healthy cells.

meanings.sent1: The oncogeneses led to the rapid growth of tumors in the patient.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying ways to inhibit oncogeneses to prevent tumor formation.
meanings.sent3: The oncogeneses seemed to be throwing a party, inviting all the tumors to join.
meanings.sent4: The oncogeneses were like architects, constructing tumors in the body.
meanings.sent5: The oncogeneses transformed healthy tissues into malignant tumors.
